metadata.title: CVE-2016-0650 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.47 and earlier, 5.6.28 andearlier, and 5.7.10 and earlier and MariaDB before 5.5.48, 10.0.x before10.0.24, and 10.1.x before 10.1.12 allows local users to affectavailability via vectors related to Replication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-client - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-common - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-server - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.11-0ubuntu6
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-server-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-source-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.11-0ubuntu6').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
